description: Creates an Auto Scaling group with the specified name and attributes.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Creating Auto Scaling groups modifies cloud compute infrastructure to automatically provision instances, which attackers can abuse for large-scale resource hijacking.
Auto Scaling groups allow attackers to acquire compute infrastructure at scale within a compromised AWS environment.

incidents.description: GuardDuty Extended Threat Detection uncovers cryptomining campaign on Amazon EC2 and Amazon ECS

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateAutoScalingGroup to deploy large numbers of EC2 instances automatically for cryptomining or other resource hijacking campaigns, with aggressive scaling parameters to maximize resource consumption.
